00190 inline std::string
00191 toString(IPCprocess::Component comp) {
00192   switch (comp) {
00193   case IPCprocess::ABS : return "absorption";
00194   case IPCprocess::PHS : return "phase";
00195   default : throw_error("IPC component name", "Unknown component.");
00196   }
00197 }

00207 class IPCexp : public Experiment {
00208 private:
00209 
00210   static const std::string modname;  
00211   AqSeries list0;               
00212   AqSeries listD;               
00213   const IPCprocess & proc;             
00214   IPCprocess::Component comp; 
00215 
00216   float dd;                     
00217   float dist;                   
00218   float dgamma;                 
00219 
00220   mutable Map pr0;         
00221   mutable Map prD;         
00222 
00223 public:
00224 
00232 
00233   inline IPCexp(const AqSeries & _listD, const AqSeries & _list0,
00234                 const IPCprocess & _proc, IPCprocess::Component _comp)  :
00235     Experiment(_listD.shape(), _listD.thetas()),
00236     list0(_list0),
00237     listD(_listD),
00238     proc(_proc),
00239     dd(1.0),
00240     dist(1.0),
00241     dgamma(0.0),
00242     pr0(sh),
00243     prD(sh)
00244   {
00245     if (list0.size()) {
00246       if ( list0.thetas() != thts )
00247         throw_error(modname, "Different sizes of the data aquired in different positions.");
00248       if ( list0.shape() != sh )
00249         throw_error(modname, "Different shapes of the data aquired in different positions.");
00250     }
00251     if ( sh != proc.shape() )
00252       throw_error(modname, "Different shape of the data and the processing algorithm.");
00253     component(_comp);
00254   }
00255 
00256   inline void projection( int itheta, Map & proj,
00257                           const std::vector<int> & sliceV = std::vector<int>() ) const {
00258 
00259     listD.projection(itheta, prD);
00260 
00261     if (list0.size()) {
00262       list0.projection(itheta, pr0);
00263       prD /= unzero(pr0);
00264     }
00265 
00266     proc.extract(prD, pr0, comp, dgamma);
00267 
00268     proj.resize( Shape( sliceV.size() ? sliceV.size() : sh(0) , sh(1) ) );
00269     if (sliceV.size()) {
00270       for(int icur = 0 ; icur<sliceV.size() ; icur++)
00271         proj (icur, blitz::Range::all()) =
00272           pr0 (sliceV[icur], blitz::Range::all());
00273     } else {
00274       proj = pr0;
00275     }
00276 
00277   }
00278 
00283   inline void component(IPCprocess::Component _comp) {
00284     comp = _comp;
00285     cntr = ( comp==IPCprocess::ABS ) ? Contrast::ABS : Contrast::PHS ;
00286   }
00287 
00292   inline void gamma(float _dgamma) {
00293     if ( abs(_dgamma)>=1.0 ) // should set even smaller limit
00294       throw_error(modname, "Absolute value of gamma is greater than 1.0.");
00295     dgamma = _dgamma;
00296   }
00297 
00298 
00299 };
